thread.section_title: Business and technology news from SF Bay Area and the world - San Francisco Chronicle
thread.title: Horizon takes hostile Depomed bid directly to shareholders
thread.title_full: Horizon takes hostile Depomed bid directly to shareholders - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Associated Press
title: Horizon takes hostile Depomed bid directly to shareholders
text: Horizon Pharma is pushing ahead with its hostile, $2.4 billion bid to buy Depomed by starting an offer to exchange a portion of its stock for shares of the rival drugmaker.
